languages.text: "Почему он избит? Я велел{mf||а} прекратить побои!"
"Why has he been beaten? I ordered that the beatings be stopped!"
languages.original_text: "Почему он избит? Я велел{mf||а} прекратить побои!"

traits.locale_text: "Why has he been beaten? I ordered that the beatings be stopped!"
"Why has he been beaten? I ordered that the beatings be stopped!"
"Why has he been beaten? I ordered that the beatings be stopped!"
"Why has he been beaten? I ordered that the beatings be stopped!"
"Why has he been beaten? I ordered that the beatings be stopped!"

languages.text: “你们为什么在打他？我明明已经下过命令，禁止殴打船员！”
languages.original_text: "Why has he been beaten? I ordered that the beatings be stopped!"

traits.locale_text: “你们为什么在打他？我明明已经下过命令，禁止殴打船员！”

languages.text: «¿Por qué le han propinado una paliza? ¡Ordené expresamente que dejaran de hacerlo!».
languages.original_text: "Why has he been beaten? I ordered that the beatings be stopped!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué le han propinado una paliza? ¡Ordené expresamente que dejaran de hacerlo!».

languages.text: 「何故、彼は殴られている？殴るのは禁止と言っただろう！」
languages.original_text: "Why has he been beaten? I ordered that the beatings be stopped!"

traits.locale_text: 「何故、彼は殴られている？殴るのは禁止と言っただろう！」

languages.text: "Warum wurde er geschlagen? Ich hatte doch angeordnet, die Prügel einzustellen."
languages.original_text: "Why has he been beaten? I ordered that the beatings be stopped!"

traits.locale_text: "Warum wurde er geschlagen? Ich hatte doch angeordnet, die Prügel einzustellen."

languages.text: « Pourquoi a-t-il été battu ? J'ai pourtant ordonné que cessent les passages à tabac ! »
languages.original_text: "Why has he been beaten? I ordered that the beatings be stopped!"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi a-t-il été battu ? J'ai pourtant ordonné que cessent les passages à tabac ! »

languages.text: "Neden dayak yedi? Dayağın sona ermesini emretmiştim!"
languages.original_text: "Why has he been beaten? I ordered that the beatings be stopped!"
